text:
Notwithstanding the provisions of Section 11.1 of Ordinance No. 244-77 (Annual Appropriation Ordinance, Fiscal Year 1977-1978), no federal, State or other grant funds received by any officer, employee, board or commission pursuant to an application filed in accordance with the provisions of Section 
10.170 of this Article shall be expended in whole or in part unless and until such expenditure is approved by the Board of Supervisors. 
(Added by Ord. 469-78, App. 10/20/78)

heading.catch_text: LIMITATIONS UPON EXPENDITURE OF GRANT FUNDS.
